response.original_title: Balada de los abuelos que no hicieron la América
response.overview: This documentary aims to portray the unsung epic of the Italian immigrant who, like his counterpart in the Creole ranch hands, forged the power of Argentine agriculture through his tireless work from sunrise to sunset, sacrificing his health, his life, and his hope. These are the grandparents who came here with nothing and died here with even less. They came to make their fortune in America, and most didn't succeed. Nevertheless, with their strengths and weaknesses, they contributed to building the nation.
response.title: Balada de los abuelos que no hicieron la América
